action.primary: Tonifies the Kidneys and fortifies sperm

indications: Nocturnal emissions, impotence, chronic diarrhea, Strangury

action.primary: Invigorates the Blood, disperses swelling and removes toxicity

indications: Sores, boils, traumatic injury, hemorrhoids, agalactia, rectal prolapse
Cancer due to Qi, Blood and Phlegm Stagnation

notes: This herb may be pounded into a juice, or soaked in wine or made into a powder.
Mixed with cereal oil, this herb treat infections such as: cellulitis, carbuncle, scabies, impetigo, breast mass and ulcerated smallpox
This herb treats sore throat, pharyngitis and hemorrhoids.
This herb has been shown to be effective in treating Stomach, pharyngolaryngeal, cervical and Bladder cancers and adenocarcinoma.
The leaves of the plant are considered to be the best for hemorrhoids.
